entities.name: others
entities.description: Others are described as being bound together with clasped hands, suggesting a sense of unity or togetherness.

entities.name: rope
entities.description: A rope is used as an analogy to describe the way others are bound together, implying a physical connection between them.

entities.name: fiery snake
entities.description: A fiery snake is used as another analogy to describe the binding of others, suggesting a sense of intense passion or energy.

relationships.description: Others are bound by a rope, implying a physical connection between them.
Others are also bound by a fiery snake, suggesting a sense of intense passion or energy connecting them.
